text: @NikkiHaley @realDonaldTrump @VP Is that why the US is now deluged by the killer that is #COVID19? Their leadership told you Covid19 was fake. Now the US is more contaminated than most third world countries.Trump & Rudy pimped antimalaria drugs 2 voters on Twitter. 1 dead. DON’T trust guys who kill their own.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
